entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 1:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: NW 61 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy in onshore winds with flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow in the heaviest flurries. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
